metadata.title: CVE-2020-7020 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Elasticsearch versions before 6.8.13 and 7.9.2 contain a documentdisclosure flaw when Document or Field Level Security is used. Searchqueries do not properly preserve security permissions when executingcertain complex queries. This could result in the search disclosing theexistence of documents the attacker should not be able to view. This couldresult in an attacker gaining additional insight into potentially sensitiveindices.

criterions.comment: elasticsearch package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
